Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Enum BleTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BleTask>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BleTask>
    public enum BleTask
extends java.lang.Enum<BleTask>
    Under the hood, SweetBlue uses a priority task queue to serialize all interaction with the native BLE stack. This enumeration represents all the tasks that are used and lets you control various timing options in BleDeviceConfig and BleManagerConfig, for example BleNodeConfig.taskTimeoutRequestFilter.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      ADD_SERVICE
      Associated with BleServer.addService(BleService, AddServiceListener) or overloads.
      BOND
      Associated with BleDevice.bond() and BleDeviceState.BONDING.
      CONNECT
      Associated with BleDevice.connect() and its several overloads.
      CONNECT_SERVER
      Associated with BleServer.connect(String) or overloads.
      DELAY
      This is used to add a delay between tasks.
      DISCONNECT
      Associated with BleDevice.disconnect().
      DISCONNECT_SERVER
      Associated with BleServer.disconnect(String).
      DISCOVER_SERVICES
      Associated with discovering services after a BleDevice becomes BleDeviceState.BLE_CONNECTED.
      NUKE_BLE_STACK
      Associated with BleManager.nukeBle()
      READ
      Associated with BleDevice.read(java.util.UUID, com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReadWriteListener).
      READ_DESCRIPTOR
      Associated with BleDevice.readDescriptor(UUID, UUID, ReadWriteListener) or overloads.
      READ_PHYSICAL_LAYER
      Gets the value set via BleDevice.setPhyOptions(Phy, ReadWriteListener), which dictates Bluetooth 5 specific features.
      READ_RSSI
      Associated with BleDevice.readRssi() and BleDevice.startRssiPoll(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Interval) (and overloads thereof).
      RELIABLE_WRITE
      Associated with BleDevice.reliableWrite_execute().
      RESOLVE_CRASHES
      Associated with BleManagerConfig.enableCrashResolver.
      SEND_NOTIFICATION
      Associated with sending a notification to a remote client through BleServer.sendNotification(String, UUID, UUID, FutureData, OutgoingListener) or BleServer.sendIndication(String, UUID, UUID, FutureData, OutgoingListener) overloads.
      SEND_READ_WRITE_RESPONSE
      Associated with IncomingListener.Please.respondWithSuccess(), IncomingListener.Please.respondWithError(int), or various other static methods of IncomingListener.Please.
      SET_CONNECTION_PRIORITY
      Associated with BleDevice.setConnectionPriority(BleConnectionPriority, ReadWriteListener) or overloads.
      SET_MTU
      Associated with BleDevice.negotiateMtu(int) or overloads.
      SET_PHYSICAL_LAYER
      Associated with BleDevice.setPhyOptions(Phy), which sets Bluetooth 5 specific features.
      SHUTDOWN
      This is used when calling BleManager.shutdown().
      START_ADVERTISING
      Associated with BleServer.startAdvertising(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.BleScanRecord), BleServer.startAdvertising(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.BleScanRecord, AdvertisingListener)
      TOGGLE_NOTIFY
      Associated with BleDevice.enableNotify(java.util.UUID, com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReadWriteListener) and BleDevice.disableNotify(java.util.UUID, com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReadWriteListener).
      TURN_BLE_OFF
      Associated with BleManager.turnOff()
      TURN_BLE_ON
      Associated with BleManager.turnOn()
      UNBOND
      Associated with BleDevice.unbond().
      WRITE
      Associated with BleDevice.write(java.util.UUID, byte[], com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ReadWriteListener).
      WRITE_DESCRIPTOR
      Associated with BleDevice.writeDescriptor(UUID, UUID, byte[], ReadWriteListener) or overloads.

      boolean usesCharUuid()

      • DELAY

        public static final BleTask DELAY
        This is used to add a delay between tasks. Right now, this is not currently used.

      • SHUTDOWN

        public static final BleTask SHUTDOWN
        This is used when calling BleManager.shutdown(). This task ensures that all devices have actually been disconnected.
